LoLStoreLinkDescription:
Can't find what you were looking for?
You can still visit the legacy content in the League of Legends Store
troves_ftf_body: We converted any bounty progress or Promise Tokens to their equivalent in rewards, rounded up to the next milestone. Redeem these for your choice of content in the new Rotating Shop!
troves_milestone_repeat_tooltip_descript: This track is shared across bounties
rotational_shop_bundle_disclaimer: I understand items in this bundle aren't refundable.
rotational_shop_temporary_bundle_disclai: I understand items in this bundle aren't refundable. Some are temporary
rotational_shop_content_insufficient_cur: Obtain {{currencyName}} from Treasure Realms, Events, or Battlepasses.
rotational_shop_content_insufficient_myt: Obtain Mythic Medallions from Treasure Realms.
rotational_shop_currency_description: Use {{currencyName}} in the Rotating Shop to get guaranteed content!
rotational_shop_empty_description:
River Sprites are busy working on new content to offer!
Please come back soon.
rotational_shop_empty_filtered_descripti: Try a different search or clear your filters.
rotational_shop_item_default_description: Lead your team to victory in style! This unlocks a new Tactician that can be equipped.
Transport yourself to a new realm to battle your opponents on! This unlocks a new Arena that can be equipped.
Deal damage to your opponents with flair! This unlocks a new Boom that can be equipped.
This unlocks a new emote that can be used in-game!
This unlocks a new portal that can be used in-game!
rotational_shop_no_displayed_groups_mess: We are working on bringing the next set of {{store}} items
rotational_shop_premium_currency_descrip:
Used to redeem Mythic content in the Store.

{{amount}} Mythic Medallions
rotational_shop_purchase_history_empty_b: Buy something awesome and come back later
rotational_shop_purchase_history_empty_t: No purchases with RP in the last 90 days
rotational_shop_purchase_history_lol_sto:
Can't find your past purchases?
You can see them in the League of Legends Store Purchase History.
rotational_shop_standard_currency_descri:
Used to redeem seasonal content in the Store.

{{amount}} Realm Crystals
